definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: whet, sharpen (cf. Ar. san=a id.; Aram. [[שְׁנִינׇא]], 4niyno0 sharp, etc.; Eth. [sanana:] III, 2, tasnana: contend, litigate; hence [[שֵׁן]] tooth, NH id., As. šinnu, Ar. sin=un, eth. sn: Aram. [[שִׁנׇּא]], 43no0);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: whet, sharpen: Pf. 1 s. [[אִם שַׁנּוֹתִ֫י בְּרַק חַרְבִּי]] (Ges:§ 67 ee) De 32:41, of ´[[י]]:’s preparation for judgment; 3 pl. ([[כַחֶרֶב]]) [[שָֽׁנְנוּ]] [[לְשׁוֹנׇם]] Ps 64:4, Ps 140:4 of uttering sharp words; Pt. pass. [[שְׁנוּנִים]] sharpened, of arrows, Is 5:28, Ps 45:6, fig. of tongue Ps 120:4, of false witness Pr 25:18.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[וְשִׁנַּנְתָּם לְבָנֶיךָ]] De 6:7 i.e. teach the words incisively, Germ. ‘einschärfen.’

definitions.title: Hithpō‘
definitions.body: . Impf. 1 s. Ps 73:21 in my, kidneys [[אֶשְׁתּוֹנׇ֑ן]] I was pierced (of poignant envy).
